participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and playful, I enjoy exploring new activities and staying fit.
participant_1.background: eating is something i do when i am bored. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i've short hair. two dogs live with me.

participant_2.name: Clara
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, I love engaging with children and capturing moments through my lens.
participant_2.background: i am an elementary school teacher. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm fluent in english spanish and french. i am interested in photography and like taking pictures.
